title: Recall

{{obsolete}} {{spell |name=Recall |level=3 |school1={{Summonings}} |school2={{Translocations}} |school3= |castingnoise=3 |spellnoise=0 |sources=[[Book of Summonings]]
[[Book of Unlife]] }} '''Recall''' is a level 3 [[Summonings|Summoning]]/[[Translocations|Translocation]] spell that gradually teleports all summoned or enslaved creatures on the current floor to the caster's vicinity.{{source ref|0.25.0|spl-other.cc|81}} ==Effect== One creature is recalled every 3-6 [[aut]]. It can only bring creatures to within a three-square radius of the caster, so don't expect to pull entire armies into cramped hallways. In an open area (at least 7-by-7, with the caster in the middle), it can recall at most 48 creatures. This spell will also recall zombies created by the [[Animate Dead]] spell, but only if the caster is on the same floor that they were created. Zombies will not be recalled across different floors. ==History== *The player spell was removed in [[0.26]]. [[Beogh]], [[Hepliaklqana]], and [[Yredelemnul]] still have recall abilities for their specific minions. *Prior to [[0.12]], it was impossible to recall flying monsters over [[lava]] or [[deep water]]. ==References==
